languages.text: {n}Абесс морщится при звуках Толкователя и пренебрежительно отворачивается от вас, перекидываясь парой слов со стоящей рядом ведьмой. Издевательский смех и надменные взгляды в вашу сторону не оставляют сомнений в том, кто именно стал предметом разговора.{/n}

{n}Aebys frowns at the sound of the Elucidator and turns away from you dismissively, exchanging a few words with the Wych standing next to him. The mocking laughter and haughty looks in your direction leave no doubt about the subject of their conversation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Абесс морщится при звуках Толкователя и пренебрежительно отворачивается от вас, перекидываясь парой слов со стоящей рядом ведьмой. Издевательский смех и надменные взгляды в вашу сторону не оставляют сомнений в том, кто именно стал предметом разговора.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aebys frowns at the sound of the Elucidator and turns away from you dismissively, exchanging a few words with the Wych standing next to him. The mocking laughter and haughty looks in your direction leave no doubt about the subject of their conversation.{/n}
traits.speaker: Abess

languages.text: {n}听到阐释器里传来的声音之后，阿贝斯皱起了眉头，轻蔑地转过了身，与站在他身边的巫灵说了几句话。随后，两人朝你的方向投来了傲慢的目光，发出了嘲讽的笑声。他们说话的内容，光凭他们的反应大概也能猜得到。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Aebys frowns at the sound of the Elucidator and turns away from you dismissively, exchanging a few words with the Wych standing next to him. The mocking laughter and haughty looks in your direction leave no doubt about the subject of their conversation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}听到阐释器里传来的声音之后，阿贝斯皱起了眉头，轻蔑地转过了身，与站在他身边的巫灵说了几句话。随后，两人朝你的方向投来了傲慢的目光，发出了嘲讽的笑声。他们说话的内容，光凭他们的反应大概也能猜得到。{/n}
traits.speaker: Abess

languages.text: {n}Aebys fronce les sourcils en entendant l'élucidateur et se détourne avec dédain pour échanger quelques mots avec la Céraste à ses côtés. Vu les rires moqueurs et les regards hautains posés sur vous, vous n'avez aucun doute sur le sujet de leur conversation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Aebys frowns at the sound of the Elucidator and turns away from you dismissively, exchanging a few words with the Wych standing next to him. The mocking laughter and haughty looks in your direction leave no doubt about the subject of their conversation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abess fronce les sourcils en entendant l'élucidateur et se détourne avec dédain pour échanger quelques mots avec la Céraste à ses côtés. Vu les rires moqueurs et les regards hautains posés sur vous, vous n'avez aucun doute sur le sujet de leur conversation.{/n}
traits.speaker: Abess

languages.text: {n}Aebys frunce el ceño al oír el Dilucidador y te da la espalda con desdén, dirigiéndose a la bruja que tiene al lado. La risa burlona y las miradas altivas que te dirigen no dejan lugar a dudas respecto al tema de la conversación.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Aebys frowns at the sound of the Elucidator and turns away from you dismissively, exchanging a few words with the Wych standing next to him. The mocking laughter and haughty looks in your direction leave no doubt about the subject of their conversation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abess frunce el ceño al oír el Dilucidador y te da la espalda con desdén, dirigiéndose a la bruja que tiene al lado. La risa burlona y las miradas altivas que te dirigen no dejan lugar a dudas respecto al tema de la conversación.{/n}
traits.speaker: Abess

languages.text: {n}アベスはエルシデイターの音に顔をしかめ、呆れたようにあなたから視線を外す。そして、隣に立っていたウィッチと言葉をかわす。嘲笑の声と高慢なまなざしから、会話内容が伝わってくる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Aebys frowns at the sound of the Elucidator and turns away from you dismissively, exchanging a few words with the Wych standing next to him. The mocking laughter and haughty looks in your direction leave no doubt about the subject of their conversation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アベスはエルシデイターの音に顔をしかめ、呆れたようにあなたから視線を外す。そして、隣に立っていたウィッチと言葉をかわす。嘲笑の声と高慢なまなざしから、会話内容が伝わってくる。{/n}
traits.speaker: Abess

languages.text: {n}Aebys runzelt angesichts des Geräuschs des Elucidator die Stirn und wendet sich von dir ab, um einige Worte mit der Hektari zu wechseln, die neben ihm steht. Das spöttische Lachen und die hochmütigen Blicke in deine Richtung lassen keinen Zweifel am Thema ihrer Unterhaltung aufkommen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Aebys frowns at the sound of the Elucidator and turns away from you dismissively, exchanging a few words with the Wych standing next to him. The mocking laughter and haughty looks in your direction leave no doubt about the subject of their conversation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abess runzelt ob des Klangs des Elucidators die Stirn und wendet sich abschätzig von dir ab, um ein paar Worte mit der Hekatari neben sich auszutauschen. Das spöttische Gelächter und die hochnäsigen Blicke in deine Richtung lassen wenig Zweifel, worum es geht.{/n}
traits.speaker: Abess

languages.text: {n}Aydınlatıcı'dan çıkan sese surat asan Aebys, kibirle sana arkasını dönüp yanında duran Viç ile konuşuyor. Alaycı kahkahalar atıp kibirle sana baktıklarına göre hiç şüphesiz senden bahsediyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Aebys frowns at the sound of the Elucidator and turns away from you dismissively, exchanging a few words with the Wych standing next to him. The mocking laughter and haughty looks in your direction leave no doubt about the subject of their conversation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aebys, Aydınlatıcı'dan çıkan sese surat asıp kibirle sana arkasını dönerek yanında duran Viç ile konuşuyor. Alaycı kahkahalar atıp kibirle sana baktıklarına göre hiç şüphesiz senden bahsediyorlar.{/n}
traits.speaker: Abess
